projects.description: A random quote gets printed to the screen every 10 seconds or sooner if 'next quote' button was clicked
An html list of students reduced to just 10 items per page displaying a page navigation set of buttons at the bottom. Includes a search filter.
a programming convention activites form, requiring several fields to be filled out before submission is allowed. client-side
Hitting start game opens up a screen with a hidden phrase with an on-screen keyboard. given 5 chances to guess the letters in the phrase or the phrase it self

a client-side AJAX request, using jquery's AJAX function. Gathering 12 random employee names, locations, and other info. Provides a search filter. Clicking on the employee card displays a window with more info on the employee
